title: How to Survive
overview: Clementine Jones and her best friend Imogen had so many plans for high school but when a car accident leaves Imogen in a coma, Clementine decides to vlog her day-to-day life so Imogen can catch up on all the drama at Attaway High when she gets back, and along the way, Clem learns a thing or two about how to survive high school.
